channel.title: Java tutorials to learn language of Java
channel.description: well, ive decided instead of posting every issue i come upon here and waiting for someone to help me. i want to learn what the stuff means so i can code stuff on my own.. is there any process thats straightforward and dont tell me stuff like "you are about to learn java" and that stuff that just inteferes with the learning. well if you can hook me up with some links that would be kool.

item.title: Java tutorials to learn language of Java
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

I would have to say this

Prentice Hall Core Java -Volume I Fundamentals 8th Edition Sep 2007

It is a very easy read book yes it 825 pages many blank pages though and words are just written Big.
But you can finish all pages in 2 days so gives time to re-read to memorize and let more information sink in over and over again.

It teaches everything you need to know about building a server the last 100/200? pages are useless just teaches you GUI with swing.

i’ll upload it to rapidshare in a bit

edit:
uploaded: http://rapidshare.com/files/78684829/Prentice.Hall.Core.Java.Volume.I.Fundamentals.8th.Edition.Sep.2007.pdf

Read full topic
